Uses of Interface
uk.ac.liv.ai.learning.DiscreteLearner

Packages that use DiscreteLearner
uk.ac.liv.ai.learning A library of learning algorithms used by JASA agents. 
 

Uses of DiscreteLearner in uk.ac.liv.ai.learning
 

Subinterfaces of DiscreteLearner in uk.ac.liv.ai.learning
 interface MDPLearner
          Classes implementing this interface implement learning algorithms for markoff descision processes.
 interface StimuliResponseLearner
          Classes implementing this interface implement myopic stimuli-response reinformcement learning algorithms.
 

Classes in uk.ac.liv.ai.learning that implement DiscreteLearner
 class DumbLearner
          A learner that chooses the same specified action on every iteration.
 class DumbRandomLearner
          A learner that simply plays a random action on each iteration without any learning.
 class MetaLearner
           
 class NPTRothErevLearner
           A modification of RothErev to address parameter degeneracy, and modified learning with 0-reward.
 class QLearner
           An implementation of the Q-learning algorithm, with epsilon-greedy exploration.
 class RothErevLearner
           A class implementing the Roth-Erev learning algorithm.
 class StatelessQLearner
          A memory-less version of the Q-Learning algorithm.
